code: import React from'react';import GridLines from'./GridLines';import Days from'./Days';import Times from'./Times';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Schedule=function Schedule(){var startHour=8.3;var endHour=16;var rowOffset=1;var colOffset=1;var getNumRows=function getNumRows(){return(Math.ceil(endHour)-Math.floor(startHour))*2+rowOffset;};var getNumCol=function getNumCol(){return 5+colOffset;};var dims={gridTemplateColumns:".4fr repeat(".concat(getNumCol()-1,", 1fr)"),gridTemplateRows:"repeat(".concat(getNumRows(),", 1fr)")};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"schedule box",style:dims,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Days,{offset:colOffset,weekend:false}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Times,{startTime:8.3,endTime:22,numRow:getNumRows(),offset:rowOffset}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GridLines,{numRow:getNumRows(),numCol:getNumCol()})]});};export default Schedule;
